flawed_nl_solution:
John was 39-3=<<39-3=36>>36 years old 3 years ago
So that means in 6 years James will be 36/2=<<36/2=18>>18 years old
So right now James is 18-6=<<18-6=21>>21 years old
So James's older brother is 21+4=<<21+4=25>>25 years old
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
